=========================

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CH8SEI0_00
From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-21 16:19
Subject: Exclusive Christofle Staff Sale, Our New Group Transfer Pricing Policy, Breaking the Silence, Road Safety Awareness Campaign, Financial Awareness Session, Jacquemus Sale, Performance Booster Month & Discount at Dr. Costi’s Clinique
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XU2aFSQC50WDUqq6Jr68PQ/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XU2aFSQC50WDUqq6Jr68PQ/550658/D7B92D607CC1DABED808484F6FD65110/2024_07_18_christofle_holidays_season_prepa_sapin_7734.jpg> 	

EXCLUSIVE CHRISTOFLE STAFF SALE


Christofle is offering an exclusive end of year exceptional offer starting TODAY until Wednesday 27th of November, with:
-  60% discount on the following MOOD references: MOOD Party, MOOD Party Tray, MOOD Asia and MOOD Asia Tray.
- 60% discount on the Babylone collection (excluding jewelry and bread plates).

chunks.text:
Christofle is offering an exclusive end of year exceptional offer starting TODAY until Wednesday 27th of November, with:
-  60% discount on the following MOOD references: MOOD Party, MOOD Party Tray, MOOD Asia and MOOD Asia Tray.
- 60% discount on the Babylone collection (excluding jewelry and bread plates).

How can you benefit from this offer?
- Go to www.christofle.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.christofle.com%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWXJNfSrmFqI6lIaeHiGYBWk2DSUx0Ce4Z1YBO6xC50ObWcjSqUr4UV8FxowEtml4Gg2QC2aQtMuj2awy82XJzmT7LcZFt4D%252bF4hx5vDxRQXSFxqQSXsaH06PNe%252fkssBoIFhMNWrJcA5WpXfM13QrdMauD%252b3MC9zgCmph1tuNwa4ERp%252fs%252fmC5L5X27YBkVglUWITm8bhFNmvqPkPcrNK5%252bdS5nmbiDVE%252bM6SLKb4cV4xQ&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C1fcedf1d29074998bb9e08dd0a26cd64%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638677883962747528%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=8%2FPwHglqqdYRartLj2rgGgBMKgarF%2F2wUY928D7pX9A%3D&reserved=0> 
- Create an account on the website with your professional/Chalhoub Group e-mail address (if you do not already have one).
- Add a MOOD by Christofle to your basket.
- Enter the privilege code NOEL24CH 

This offer is reserved for Chalhoub Group team members only. Happy Shopping!

OUR NEW GROUP TRANSFER PRICING POLICY

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XU2aFSQC50WDUqq6Jr68PQ/550659/443AB4668A5448FEACE6BB991787F451/pexels-andrew-2312369.jpg> 	
Group Tax launches the Group Transfer Pricing Policy, which was developed to ensure alignment with global compliance and regulatory obligations. 

This policy is fundamental in guiding pricing of intercompany transactions and arrangements across our legal entities to ensure transparency, consistency, and compliance.

<https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XU2aFSQC50WDUqq6Jr68PQ/550659/443AB4668A5448FEACE6BB991787F451/pexels-andrew-2312369.jpg> 	
Group Tax launches the Group Transfer Pricing Policy, which was developed to ensure alignment with global compliance and regulatory obligations. 

This policy is fundamental in guiding pricing of intercompany transactions and arrangements across our legal entities to ensure transparency, consistency, and compliance.

Read the summary of the policy document here, <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252fresources%252ffile%252fNDE0%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWXJNfSrmFqI6lIaeHiGYBWk2DSUx0Ce4Z1YBO6xC50ObWcjSqUr4UV8FxowEtml4Gg2QC2aQtMuj2awy82XJzmT7LcZFt4D%252bF4hx5vDxRQXSFxqQSXsaH06PNe%252fkssBoIFhMNWrJcA5WpXfM13QrdMauD%252b3MC9zgCmph1tuNwa4ERp%252fs%252fmC5L5X27YBkVglUWITm8bhFNmvqPkPcrNK5%252bdS5nmbiDVE%252bM6SLKb4cV4xQ&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C1fcedf1d29074998bb9e08dd0a26cd64%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638677883962785599%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=z0OvXYYnwEvisgYfAHPSw%2B3hw9PhwOW9rN58syqRttc%3D&reserved=0> where you will find the scope, pricing methodology and reporting and accountability within each department.

For any questions or clarification, please reach out to Group Tax team – Mariel Yard (VP - Tax) or Nehaal Kadge (TP Lead).

BREAKING THE SILENCE: THINGS WE DON’T TALK ABOUT ENOUGH

For Men's Health Month, we’re holding a space for an open and honest conversation about topics you don’t often discuss. Join Coach Adil for a session focused on the value of expression and shifting from a “grind mindset” to a “growth mindset.” Have any questions you’d prefer to ask anonymously? Submit them here <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fforms.office.com%252fr%252fTzTjX4fmc6%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWXJNfSrmFqI6lIaeHiGYBWk2DSUx0Ce4Z1YBO6xC50ObWcjSqUr4UV8FxowEtml4Gg2QC2aQtMuj2awy82XJzmT7LcZFt4D%252bF4hx5vDxRQXSFxqQSXsaH06PNe%252fkssBoIFhMNWrJcA5WpXfM13QrdMauD%252b3MC9zgCmph1tuNwa4ERp%252fs%252fmC5L5X27YBkVglUWITm8bhFNmvqPkPcrNK5%252bdS5nmbiDVE%252bM6SLKb4cV4xQ&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C1fcedf1d29074998bb9e08dd0a26cd64%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638677883962809915%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=fLmJl5NrZjQoGRXnSqaGnN959RJUeXOGUoRzZHv3Xrs%3D&reserved=0> .

JOIN OUR ROAD SAFETY AWARENESS CAMPAIGN WITH EMIRATES DRIVING INSTITUTE 

Be part of our Group's Safe Driving Campaign in collaboration with Emirates Driving Institute!

Sign up to for one of our 8 sessions taking place on December 10th & 11th at our DIP Warehouse between 10 AM to 6 PM.

Join us for a Financial Awareness Session by Emirates NBD aimed at enhancing your financial literacy and well-being! This session covers essentials like understanding credit scores, spotting fraud, managing debt with the Debt-to-Burden Ratio, navigating loans and credit, and setting smart financial goals.

Date: Thursday, 28th Nov |11AM to 12PM | Calendar invites will be sent out shortly.

Don’t miss this chance to gain valuable financial tips and ask all your questions!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XU2aFSQC50WDUqq6Jr68PQ/544531/7A08952C56C6A8722FC7C606A1F87310/nuggets-46.png> 	

JACQUEMUS FRIENDS & FAMILY SALE

The discount will be applied automatically.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XU2aFSQC50WDUqq6Jr68PQ/550655/E35FBAFEAC04608F20A3EBBCB0326C39/1-5-2.jpg> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XU2aFSQC50WDUqq6Jr68PQ/545122/532592ADCA76A26DF1DE256E516B3B3C/nuggets-53.png>

chunks.text:
<https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XU2aFSQC50WDUqq6Jr68PQ/550655/E35FBAFEAC04608F20A3EBBCB0326C39/1-5-2.jpg> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XU2aFSQC50WDUqq6Jr68PQ/545122/532592ADCA76A26DF1DE256E516B3B3C/nuggets-53.png> 	

PERFORMANCE BOOSTER MONTH: FINAL WEEK REMINDER

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XU2aFSQC50WDUqq6Jr68PQ/550634/140DE328A117AC9A6956FBC999C88818/image-2024-11-18t142836-138.jpeg> 	
As we approach the final week of Performance Booster Month, we’re excited to continue building on the valuable insights shared so far. From mastering effective year-end reviews to exploring the power of meaningful conversations, the sessions have been highly engaging and impactful.

Next week, we’ll wrap up with our final theme: Fairness and Equity in Performance Management. Calendar invites are out already.

If you missed any of the previous sessions, you can catch up here. Let’s make the last week count!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XU2aFSQC50WDUqq6Jr68PQ/545322/70D03394B6177C73313AD1F763194D03/nuggets-56.png> 	

EXCLUSIVE DISCOUNT AT LAS VEGAS AESTHETIC MEDICAL CENTER & FIRST MEDICAL CENTER

Enjoy 25% discount at Dr. Costi’s Clinique in Dubai! 

The offer is valid on a range of treatments and services at the Las Vegas Medical Center and First Medical Center LLC. This exclusive offer applies to all consultations and procedures with Dr. Costi.
